name: Tournament Golf
overview: Tee off with Tournament Golf, a challenging new computer game from Avalon Hill Microcomputer Games. Loaded with excitement from the amateur to the pro levels. Features 2 complete 18 hole courses with fairways, greens, traps and gophers. A driving range and a putting green for practice and a secret room in the bunker where we can have our raves. All the challenges and frustrations of the sport of golf, all experienced from the comfort of your computer chair.
